title: ジャパンダートダービーにむけて

text.jpText:
『ジャパンダートダービー』当日。
スマートファルコンは得意のダートコースに
自信をのぞかせていた。
text.enText:
The day of the Japan Dirt Derby. Smart Falcon 
looked confident on her favorite dirt course. 
confidence on her favorite dirt course.

text.jpText:
しかし、希望にあふれていた『皐月賞』の
出走前と違い、今日の地下バ道には
ギラギラした表情の者も多い。
text.enText:
However, unlike before "Satsuki-sho," which 
was filled with hope, today's underground 
boulevard is filled with people with a glazed 
look on their faces. many of them have a 
glazed look on their faces.

text.jpText:
芝で勝てなかった者。実力が足りず芝に挑め
なかった者。追い詰められ、後がない思いで
ダートに挑む者もいるのだ。
text.enText:
Those who did not win on grass. Those who 
could not challenge on grass because they 
were not good enough. Some were cornered and 
had no choice but to try the dirt. Some of 
them challenge the dirt.

text.jpText:
“崖っぷち”の気迫で挑む周囲のウマ娘たち。
スマートファルコンはその気迫をまとめて
吞み込むべく、レースへと臨む。
text.enText:
The horsegirls around them are on the verge 
of a cliff, and they are determined to 
take on the challenge. Smart Falcon is 
determined to capture the spirit of all 
of them. Smart Falcon is determined to 
take in the spirit of the race.
